actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an income tax credit to long-term caregivers.
short_title: Caregivers Assistance and Resources Enhancement (CARE) Tax Credit Act

summary.text: Caregivers Assistance and Resources Enhancement (CARE) Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise and rename section 24 (Child Tax Credit). Renames such section the Family Care Credit. Includes, in addition to the $500 per child credit, a $1,000 per member-of-a-household credit for household members requiring specified long-term care.
